title: vANI aruL
sahitya:
vANI aruL purivAi aLikulavENI malarayan rANi uyar kalai


anupallavi

  pEnip-pugazhum pAvanark-karuLum sukha pANi
 sUrar tozhum purANi sharaNam kalai


caraNam    vINA pustaka dhAriNi pUraNi vidyA rUpiNi dukkha nivAraNi
kANEn unaiyaladOr tuNai bhArati karuNAkari emmaik-kAttaruL nI gati
